instruction: Generate a summary for the given blog post.
input:
The wonderful world of Web accessibility

As the web grows, accessible web content becomes more important. Accessible websites have a better user experience and are beneficial both to developers and users. They allow everyone, regardless of disability, to get improved access to information and resources.
output: Web accessibility has become increasingly important as the web expands, offering improved access to information and resources for all users including those with disabilities. Accessible websites enhance user experiences and are beneficial to both developers and users.
